text:
Do you live in Bristol? Aged 50 years or above, and not yet received a #COVID19 vaccine? 

Researchers are calling for volunteers to take part in a new COVID-19 #vaccine study now open at @ResearchNBT.

Visit https://t.co/I8VTVE1zqI  to find out more.

#BePartOfResearch https://t.co/Yojw9uLO4L
